solution_line_template: He has {total_boxwoods} boxwoods to trim and will charge ${trim_cost_per_boxwood} each so he will charge {total_boxwoods}*{trim_cost_per_boxwood} = $<<{total_boxwoods}*{trim_cost_per_boxwood}={total_trimming_cost}>>{total_trimming_cost}

He will shape {num_shaped_boxwoods} boxwoods into spheres for ${shape_cost_per_boxwood} each so he will charge {num_shaped_boxwoods}*{shape_cost_per_boxwood} = $$<<{num_shaped_boxwoods}*{shape_cost_per_boxwood}={total_shaping_cost}>>{total_shaping_cost}
